name: Mannaz
description:
Welcome to Mannaz!

Explore the ancient maze-city of Mannaz. 

After centuries of Greed, the Hubris of mankind has manifested and tainted the maze. Enter the maze with your trusty ally to cleanse it!

Controls and tutorial:

controller support: move with left stick - use your ability with X - attack with right Trigger

keyboard support: wasd to move - use your ability with space bar - attack with left mouse button

couch co-op! one player uses controller, the other uses keyboard.

The player controlling the whisp needs to light the path and lead the way while the other player carries the menhir to the central chambers where the corruption is greatest. Put the menhir in the center to start the cleansing ritual

The cleansing ritual: 

Living corruption will be attracted to the menhir and try to stop the ritual, viking player says SMASH. To fully activate the menhir the whisp player has light to surrounding pedestals in the right order. Once cleansed the dynamic duo can take the menhir to the next chamber.

cleanse all the chambers and reach the end of the maze to save Mankind!
